name: Mortimer Beckett and the Crimson Thief LITE
name_original: Mortimer Beckett and the Crimson Thief LITE
description:
Join Mortimer on his most challenging adventure yet in Mortimer Beckett and the Crimson Thief.

Finally home after his astounding journey, Mortimer resumes his simple life and peruses the daily newspaper. One by one, famous artifacts from museums and private collections around the world are missing. The person claiming responsibility for the thefts goes by the moniker - the Crimson Thief, a ghost that the police can do nothing about. Mortimer however, jumps on the case and is determined to find the stolen goods while bringing the thief to justice.

Follow Mortimer around the world to recover the stolen items. Visit Paris, Rio, London, and other fabulous destinations where you will search for useful items, solve whimsical puzzles, and meet helpful locals. There's much more to this new mystery than meets the eye. Are the artifacts connected in any way? Can Mortimer piece together the clues to finding them all? Who is the Crimson Thief?

Play Mortimer Beckett and the Crimson Thief and help solve the mystery!

FEATURES INCLUDE:
• Follow Mortimer around the world in this exciting hidden object sequel
• Visit Paris, Rio, London, and more in search of stolen artifacts
• Search for useful items to solve whimsical puzzles

Mortimer Beckett and the Crimson Thief is also available for Mac
